param.name: peaks
param.label: Input Peak Data
param.help: The input data frame containing abundance and peak mass.

param.name: SN
param.label: Signal-to-Noise Ratio
param.help: Sets the noise cut for the data; peaks below this value will not be evaluated.

param.name: Carbrat
param.label: Maximum 13C/12C Ratio
param.help: Sets the maximum allowed ratio for matching 13C isotopes.

param.name: Sulfrat
param.label: Maximum 34S/32S Ratio
param.help: Sets the maximum allowed ratio for matching 34S isotopes.

param.name: Sulferr
param.label: Maximum Error for 34S Matching (ppm)
param.help: Sets the maximum allowed error (ppm) for 34S mass matching.

param.name: Carberr
param.label: Maximum Error for 13C Matching (ppm)
param.help: Sets the maximum allowed error (ppm) for 13C mass matching.
